definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°

sentences.english: Gold recovery from arsenic-containing gold ore has been a major subject of flotation research.
sentences.chinese: 從含砷金礦石中回收金一直是浮選研究的重要課題。

sentences.english: Arsenic can get into air water and the ground from wind-blown dust.
sentences.chinese: 砷可通過風中的粉塵污染空氣，水，和土壤。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the method for determining controlled contents of As, Pb and Hg in Chinese medicinal materials.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定中藥材中重金屬砷鉛汞的控制含量方法。

sentences.english: Vermilion contains heavy metal arsenic and mercury.
sentences.chinese: 硃砂含有重金屬砷和汞。

sentences.english: The concentration of arsenicum in coal was very high, and the internal air arsenicum pollution was serious.
sentences.chinese: 居民燃用的石煤砷含量極高，其居住室內砷污染嚴重。

sentences.english: The concentration of arsenicum in coal was very high, and the internal air arsenicum pollution was serious.
sentences.chinese: 居民燃用的石煤砷含量極高，其居住室內砷污染嚴重。

sentences.english: The analysis showed a few grains of arse nic in the solution.
sentences.chinese: 分析顯示溶液中有幾格令的砷。

sentences.english: The arsenic-containing industrial wastewater treated with fly ash as adsorbent has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了以粉煤灰爲吸附劑處理含砷工業廢水。

sentences.english: The analysis showed a few grains of arsenic in the solution.
sentences.chinese: 剖析表現溶液中有幾格令的砷。

sentences.english: The determination of traces of arsenic in light oil by GFAAS was described.
sentences.chinese: 研究了輕質油中痕量砷的幾種樣品處理方法。

sentences.english: Arsenic has a diffusion coefficient an order of magnitude lower than that of boron and phosphorous.
sentences.chinese: 砷的擴散係數比硼和磷低一個數量級。

sentences.english: This article is studying in the pretreatment approach of high-sulfur and high-arsenic refractory gold concentrate(HHRGC).
sentences.chinese: 本文是對高硫高砷難浸金精礦的預處理方法進行研究。

sentences.english: Experimental Study on the Treatment of Wastewater Containing Arsenic by Polysilicate-metal Salts;
sentences.chinese: 研究了以粉煤灰爲吸附劑處理含砷工業廢水。

sentences.english: Organic selenium affected excretion of arsenic obviously.
sentences.chinese: 有機硒排砷作用非常顯著。

sentences.english: The Arsenic belongs to toxic semi-metal element.
sentences.chinese: 砷是一種具有毒性的準金屬元素。

sentences.english: But the possibility she had arsenic for rheumatism, say, is quite likely, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 但不排除她因爲風溼病服用砷的可能性。
